translation.en: [male newscaster on radio] Vehicle in the left lane causing congestion, so… -[static buzzes] -…avoid this route.
translation.zh: 车辆在左车道上造成拥堵 所以请避开这条路线

translation.en: [male newscaster two] Thank you for the morning traffic update, John.
translation.zh: 谢谢你早上的交通更新 约翰

translation.en: [female newscaster] You know, Fred, I always get this strange feeling
translation.zh: 弗雷德 你知道吗？ 当我堵在路上时

translation.en: when I'm stuck in traffic.
translation.zh: 我总是有这种奇怪的感觉

translation.en: There I am, mere feet away from other people
translation.zh: 我离其他被堵在同一条柏油路的人

translation.en: packed together on a strip of asphalt.
translation.zh: 只有几步远

translation.en: Yet we find ourselves passing by each other
translation.zh: 但我们却夹带着彼此的

translation.en: from the loneliness of our respective tin cans.
translation.zh: 装满孤独的铁皮盒子擦肩而过

translation.en: [man on radio] You got the supply chain, right? Transportation of goods being… [fades out]
translation.zh: 你拿到供应链了 对吧？ 货物运输正在…

translation.en: Your goal is to meet your high-value objectives,
translation.zh: 你的目标是满足你的高价值客户

translation.en: ensure the supplier feels good about the deal.
translation.zh: 确保供应商对交易感到满意

translation.en: [female DJ] Let's round off the hour and welcome the rising sun
translation.zh: 节目的尾声 让我们用一首 相信大家会记住的歌曲

translation.en: with a song that I'm sure you'll remember.
translation.zh: 来迎接初升的太阳

translation.en: [woman one on radio] How is your morning, drivers?
translation.zh: 各位司机 早上好啊

translation.en: [woman one on radio] All good in Albany, ladies, headin' south.
translation.zh: 奥尔巴尼一切顺利 女士们 往南走

translation.en: [woman one] Well, I pulled an all-nighter out here, unloading in Sacramento.
translation.zh: 我昨晚通宵达旦 在萨克拉门托卸货

translation.en: [woman two] Mornin' over there yet? [woman one] No, it's all dark here.
translation.zh: -那里是早上了吗？ -还没 这里一片漆黑

translation.en: Can't wait to head back East
translation.zh: 我迫不及待想卸完货

translation.en: as soon as I get her emptied out and loaded back up.
translation.zh: 重新装车回东部去

translation.en: [woman three] Well, I got a great view up in the Rockies,
translation.zh: 我在落基山看到了很棒的景色

translation.en: but the truth is I'm just scared shitless of the trip down.
translation.zh: 但事实是 我非常害怕这次返程

translation.en: [woman one] Break on the engine, sweetie.
translation.zh: 悠着点 亲爱的

translation.en: [woman two] Jake break, driver.
translation.zh: 记得刹车 司机们

translation.en: [woman one] How about you, Sally? Hey, chiquita, you still there?
translation.zh: 莎莉 你呢？ 嘿 奇基塔 你还在吗？

translation.en: Yeah, still here. I got a beautiful day here.
translation.zh: 是的 我还在 我这里晴空万里

translation.en: Heading east to 61.
translation.zh: 正往东去61号公路

translation.en: [woman one] Good to have you back, chica.
translation.zh: 欢迎回来 基塔

translation.en: [woman two] Oh, shut up, Pattie. She's Canadian, not Mexican.
translation.zh: 帕蒂 闭嘴 她是加拿大人 不是墨西哥人

translation.en: [Pattie] She talks weird. That's all I know.
translation.zh: 我只知道她的口音很奇怪

translation.en: [Sally] Okay, you're giving me shit, you motherfuckers.
translation.zh: 好吧 你们这些混蛋让我很不爽

translation.en: -[all laughing] -[Dolly] Oh, yeah. You got it.
translation.zh: 对啊 你懂的

translation.en: You pickin' up your brother today?
translation.zh: 你今天去接你弟弟吗？

translation.en: [woman two] No, Thursday. Come on, Dolly.
translation.zh: 不 星期四 多莉 拜托

translation.en: She ain't been talking about anything else for weeks.
translation.zh: 这是她几个星期以来唯一的话题

translation.en: [Dolly] Do he talk weird like you, Sally?
translation.zh: 莎莉 他的口音跟你一样奇怪吗？

translation.en: Well, Dolly, fuck you very much.
translation.zh: 这个嘛 多莉 操你妈的

translation.en: [woman two] Shut it. You know he came down here when he was real little.
translation.zh: 闭嘴 你知道他很小的时候 就来过这里

translation.en: Sally came later.
translation.zh: 莎莉过后也来了

translation.en: [Pattie] Yeah, right. That's what fucked her up.
translation.zh: 是的 对 这就是萨莉变得一团糟的原因

translation.en: [woman two] No, that's what fucked him up.
translation.zh: 不 是他变得一团糟

translation.en: -Fuck you, too. -Okay, drivers. Gotta go.
translation.zh: 去你们的 好了 司机们 我得走了

translation.en: [woman two] Bye now. Be safe. Safe.
translation.zh: -再见 注意安全 -注意安全

translation.en: -[Dolly] Safe. -[Sally] Safe.
translation.zh: -注意安全 -注意安全

translation.en: -[man on intercom] Yeah? -I'm here to visit.
translation.zh: -有事吗？ -我是来探访的

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [sighs] I missed you so much.
translation.zh: 我非常想念你

translation.en: [guard] Take your seats, please.
translation.zh: 请坐下

translation.en: I have not been this excited to see you since you came down from Quebec with Mom.
translation.zh: 我上一次见到你这么兴奋 还是你和妈妈从魁北克过来的时候

translation.en: [sighs] Pick you up Thursday?
translation.zh: 星期四来接你？

translation.en: -You better. -[soft chuckle]
translation.zh: 你最好记得来接我

translation.en: You got the "dress-out" in the mail, right?
translation.zh: 你已经收到出狱服装了 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: It's just so weird because, uh…
translation.zh: 这实在太奇怪了 因为…

translation.en: you know, you cope while you're in here
translation.zh: 你知道吗 我在这里生存了下来

translation.en: and… and when it's almost over, then you just can't take it anymore.
translation.zh: 而在即将要重获自由时 我却感觉再也坚持不下去了

translation.en: It's kinda like when you have to go to the bathroom--
translation.zh: 这就有点像你急着上洗手间…

translation.en: You're almost there, and the door is locked.
translation.zh: 你就快到时 却发现门被锁上了

translation.en: [guard] Sit back, please.
translation.zh: 请坐好

translation.en: It's her.
translation.zh: 是她

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, I know what I want.
translation.zh: 嗯 我知道我想要什么

translation.en: I want you to make me that… tart tartu.
translation.zh: 我想你给我做… 塔尔图馅饼

translation.en: -[laughs] -I want you to make a tart tartu.
translation.zh: 我要你做个塔尔图馅饼

translation.en: [chuckles] What was it? What was it?
translation.zh: 那是什么？ 是什么？

translation.en: What's that stuff Mom made?
translation.zh: 妈妈做的那东西叫什么？

translation.en: -Tarte Tatin. -Tarte Tatin.
translation.zh: -芬达苹果塔 -芬达苹果塔

translation.en: -Apple tart. -I love it.
translation.zh: -苹果馅饼 -我喜欢那个

translation.en: -[guard] Two minutes. -[buzzer sounds]
translation.zh: 还有两分钟

translation.en: Thursday.
translation.zh: 星期四

translation.en: What? Please, you said that was the last time.
translation.zh: 什么？ 拜托 你之前说那是最后一次了

translation.en: -[sighs] -They asked for one more.
translation.zh: 他们要求再做一次

translation.en: I know, I know, I know. I gotta get on the outside.
translation.zh: 我知道 我知道 我必须要离开

translation.en: You gotta get me on the outside. Okay? -Just one more time. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 你必须帮我离开这里 好吗？ 就再做一次

translation.en: -So, last package, I promise. -Okay.
translation.zh: -这是最后的包裹了 我保证 -好

translation.en: All right? We ain't bad. We ain't bad.
translation.zh: 我们还做得不错 对吧？

translation.en: Listen, listen, listen.
translation.zh: 听着 听着

translation.en: All visitors must exit now.
translation.zh: -所有访客请马上离开 -他们要杀了我

translation.en: They're gonna fucking kill me. Sis, you gotta get me
translation.zh: -所有访客请马上离开 -他们要杀了我 -姐姐 你得帮我离开这里 好吗？ -好的 行

translation.en: -out of here, okay? -Okay, yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: -姐姐 你得帮我离开这里 好吗？ -好的 行

translation.en: [Sally] Where's the package?
translation.zh: 包裹在哪里？

translation.en: What the fuck?
translation.zh: 他妈的搞什么？

translation.en: You'll take her there. Across the state line.
translation.zh: 你带她去那里 越过州界

translation.en: Paul's the guy who's gonna meet you. Come on, sweetie. [whistles]
translation.zh: 一个叫保罗的人会和你碰面 来吧 亲爱的

translation.en: Yep.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: No way. No fucking way.
translation.zh: 不行 这个不行

translation.en: [woman] Excuse me?
translation.zh: -什么？ -你不明白

translation.en: You don't understand. I don't take people.
translation.zh: -什么？ -你不明白 我不带人

translation.en: Hey! I was told I could trust you.
translation.zh: 嘿 别人说我可以信任你

translation.en: No way I can promise what'll happen to your brother
translation.zh: 如果你不把这女孩送到她该去的地方

translation.en: if you don't take the girl where she fucking needs to go!
translation.zh: 我不能保证你弟弟会发生什么事

translation.en: What's your name?
translation.zh: 你叫什么名字？

translation.en: We're not gonna talk.
translation.zh: 我们别跟对方说话

translation.en: Paul?
translation.zh: 保罗？

translation.en: Yep.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Come on, lady. It's paid fo--
translation.zh: 拜托 女士 付款由…

translation.en: No! Get off of me!
translation.zh: 不 放开我

translation.en: -Fuck! Fuck! Get down! -[gunshot]
translation.zh: 妈的 妈的 蹲下

translation.en: Fuck!
translation.zh: 妈的

translation.en: -[crying] -Shut up!
translation.zh: 闭嘴

translation.en: Northbound… can I get a radio check?
translation.zh: 北行的… 能和我检查一下无线电通信吗？

translation.en: Any bears at the weigh station?
translation.zh: 地磅站有警察吗？

translation.en: Any bears at the weigh--
translation.zh: 地磅站有警…

translation.en: [stutters] The fucking fuse!
translation.zh: 该死的保险丝

translation.en: -Get down! Get down! -No!
translation.zh: -蹲下 -不

translation.en: They can search the entire truck. Get down!
translation.zh: 他们会搜查整辆卡车 蹲下

translation.en: No! Stop!
translation.zh: 不 停下

translation.en: Police! Police!
translation.zh: 警察 有警察

translation.en: Is that what you want?
translation.zh: 这就是你想要的吗？

translation.en: [woman] All right, kids, run to the bathroom.
translation.zh: 好了 孩子们 快去洗手间

translation.en: We gotta get you in the back.
translation.zh: 你必须到后面去

translation.en: Come on. Come on.
translation.zh: 走吧 去吧

translation.en: -[screams] -Come on.
translation.zh: 快去

translation.en: Stop!
translation.zh: 住手！

translation.en: -No! No! -Come on!
translation.zh: -不要 -快点

translation.en: -Shh. -[screams]
translation.zh: 嘘

translation.en: -[horn honks] -[woman] Let's go, guys. Come on. Hurry--
translation.zh: 走吧 各位 快 快点…

translation.en: [woman] You're gonna miss Nia's birthday.
translation.zh: 这样想去你们会错过尼娅的生日

translation.en: -[woman] Mornin'. -Mornin'.
translation.zh: -早 -早

translation.en: -[girl grunts] -[woman] In, in, in, in. Quick, quick.
translation.zh: 进去 进去 快 快

translation.en: Seatbelts.
translation.zh: 安全带

translation.en: -Dennis? -[Dennis on phone] I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -丹尼斯？ -抱歉

translation.en: Took some time to get a burner phone. You okay?
translation.zh: 我花了点时间才搞到抛弃式手机 你还好吗？

translation.en: -It was a girl, Dennis. -What do you mean?
translation.zh: -是个女孩 丹尼斯 -你在说什么？

translation.en: Young. Ten, 12 maybe.
translation.zh: 很小 10岁吧 或是12岁

translation.en: Wait, what, what? What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 等等 什么？ 你在说什么？

translation.en: The fucking package was a girl.
translation.zh: 那该死的包裹是个女孩

translation.en: What? Oh, fuck. What did you do?
translation.zh: 什么？ 噢 该死 你做了什么？

translation.en: She shot the guy. With your shotgun.
translation.zh: 她用你的猎枪 射了那个人

translation.en: Oh, my God. [stutters] Is he dead?
translation.zh: 天啊 他死了吗？

translation.en: I don't know. I think so. I--
translation.zh: 不知道 我觉得他死了 我…

translation.en: Oh, we're so fucked. What are we gonna do?
translation.zh: 噢 我们真他妈倒霉 我们该怎么办？

translation.en: -What-what are you hauling? -Unloading in Oxford.
translation.zh: -你运着什么？ -到牛津市卸货

translation.en: Got another taking me to Jackson. That's it.
translation.zh: 顺带去杰克逊市 就这样

translation.en: Okay, all right, you just listen. Just seem-- just seem regular, you know.
translation.zh: 好 好吧 你听着 表现…表现得正常一些 你知道的

translation.en: Just finish whatever bookings you got.
translation.zh: 完成你手上的订单就是了

translation.en: Are you gonna be okay?
translation.zh: 你会不会有事？

translation.en: You're in danger, sis.
translation.zh: 你有危险 姐姐

translation.en: These guys have eyes all over the fucking state.
translation.zh: 这些家伙的眼线遍布整个州

translation.en: And the girl… where do I drop the girl?
translation.zh: 那个女孩… 我该把她送到哪里？

translation.en: I don't know, I don't know. You just gotta take her-- take her with you.
translation.zh: 我不知道 不知道 你只要带着她… 带着她

translation.en: -What? -I-I don't know.
translation.zh: -什么？ -我也不知道

translation.en: No! No way she can stay in my truck.
translation.zh: 不 她不能留在我的卡车里

translation.en: She's the only thing keepin' us safe.
translation.zh: 她是唯一能保证我们安全的人

translation.en: -[man in costume] Hey, beautiful. -Fuck off! Motherfucker!
translation.zh: -嘿 美女 -滚开 混蛋

translation.en: He just…
translation.zh: 他只是…

translation.en: He exploded.
translation.zh: 他爆发了

translation.en: This is your guy, right?
translation.zh: -就是他 对吗？ -妈的

translation.en: Fuck. Yeah, I took him down a half year ago
translation.zh: -就是他 对吗？ -妈的 对 半年前 我捣毁麦克道格尔团伙时抓到了他

translation.en: when we busted the MacDougal traffic ring.
translation.zh: 对 半年前 我捣毁麦克道格尔团伙时抓到了他

translation.en: Low level sergeant, oversaw one of the routes.
translation.zh: 低阶警佐 监督其中一条路线

translation.en: -He's out already? -[man] Out on bond.
translation.zh: -他已经出来了？ -保释出狱

translation.en: Pictures of those girls still haunt the web.
translation.zh: 这些女孩的照片仍然在网上流传

translation.en: Shell casings? Prints?
translation.zh: 有弹壳和指纹吗？

translation.en: Fingerprints only from the victim.
translation.zh: 只有受害者的指纹

translation.en: [sighs] They ended him with a slug.
translation.zh: 他们以一枪了结了他

translation.en: -Nasty choice for a hit job. -Hmm.
translation.zh: -这抢手实力不太行 -嗯

translation.en: Other slug's in that tree over there.
translation.zh: 其它子弹都打在了那边的树上

translation.en: And you're retired for how long now?
translation.zh: 你退休多久了？

translation.en: Consultant Gerick at your service.
translation.zh: 现在是顾问杰里克为您服务

translation.en: [chuckles] So, who's your new assistant?
translation.zh: 那么 谁是你的新助手？

translation.en: Ah, desk rat from legal.
translation.zh: 法律部门的行政官员 他需要现场经验

translation.en: Wants field experience. Went to Yale.
translation.zh: 法律部门的行政官员 他需要现场经验 他可是耶鲁毕业生

translation.en: I heard they have a very good English department.
translation.zh: 我听说他们的英语系很不错

translation.en: Strange.
translation.zh: 奇怪的是

translation.en: Paul came here to pick up a girl
translation.zh: 保罗到这里

translation.en: who'd been transported across the state line.
translation.zh: 来接一个被运送过州界的女孩

translation.en: His normal routine. But then…
translation.zh: 这是他的日常生活 但是被…

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么呢？

translation.en: It's what we're trying to figure out.
translation.zh: 这就是我们想搞清楚的

translation.en: We got wider and deeper tracks from the second vehicle.
translation.zh: 我们从第二辆车上 得到了更宽更深的轨迹

translation.en: It's probably a truck.
translation.zh: 可能是辆卡车

translation.en: Yeah. Refrigerated trailer or dry van.
translation.zh: 对 冷藏拖车或干式货车

translation.en: No tarp.
translation.zh: 没有篷布

translation.en: All right, well, start by alerting the weigh stations, Finley.
translation.zh: 好吧 芬利 那就从通知地磅站开始

translation.en: Excuse me, Gerick. Just, please, call me by my last name.
translation.zh: 对不起 杰里克 请称呼我的姓

translation.en: -All right, Yale. -Sterling.
translation.zh: -好吧 耶鲁 -是斯特林

translation.en: You gonna make those calls or you gonna write a poem about it?
translation.zh: 你要为此事打几个电话还是写首诗？

translation.en: I'll make the calls. Just, please, call me Sterling.
translation.zh: 我会打电话的 请叫我斯特林

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Never seen you so lazy, Ms. Sally.
translation.zh: 萨莉女士 从没见你这么迟过

translation.en: Sorry, Frank, got a bad knee.
translation.zh: 抱歉 弗兰克 我膝盖受伤了

translation.en: You got a lover in there, huh?
translation.zh: 你有情人在里面吗？

translation.en: Always.
translation.zh: 一直有

translation.en: Uh-huh. Well, you ready to roll.
translation.zh: 是吗？ 好的 你可以走了

translation.en: Take these out to the car. -[mutters] -Whoa.
translation.zh: -把这些拿到车上 -哇

translation.en: -Come on, come on. -Fine.
translation.zh: -来吧 来 -好的

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Hey, so, State Police are doing us a favor on the weigh stations,
translation.zh: 嘿 看来州警在地磅站 帮了我们一个大忙

translation.en: and we got a match on the muddy tire tracks
translation.zh: 我们在通往南部高速公路 入口处的泥泞轮胎痕迹上

translation.en: headed onto the south highway entrance. So Mississippi, not Tennessee.
translation.zh: 发现一个匹配 是往密西西比州 而不是田纳西州

translation.en: -And-- -Here.
translation.zh: -还有… -给

translation.en: Yeah, Gerick, I'm not your assistant.
translation.zh: 杰里克 我不是你的助手

translation.en: This is my case, and I appreciate having you on as a consultant,
translation.zh: 这是我的案子 我很感激你能成为我的顾问

translation.en: but right now, we just need you to sign this, and then--
translation.zh: 但现在 我们只需你在这上面签字 然后…

translation.en: We start with files from last year.
translation.zh: 我们从去年的档案开始

translation.en: I'll bet he was whacked by one of his little buddies.
translation.zh: 我敢打赌他是被他的一个同伙杀死的

translation.en: We take a look at all known associates.
translation.zh: 我们查查他所有已知的同伙

translation.en: Find out which one might've had a beef with Paul.
translation.zh: 找出谁可能与保罗有过争执

translation.en: And we're looking for a girl. One.
translation.zh: 而我们正在找一个女孩 一个

translation.en: He always bought 'em one at a time.
translation.zh: 他总是一次买一个

translation.en: Yeah, so we just need you to sign this report for headquarters.
translation.zh: 是的 所以我们只需要你在这份报告上签字

translation.en: -No time for bureaucracy, Yale. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 耶鲁 我没时间搞官僚主义

translation.en: I think you're taking this a bit too personally, sir.
translation.zh: 先生 我觉得你对此事过于耿耿于怀

translation.en: -Excuse me? -I think you heard me.
translation.zh: -抱歉 你说什么？ -我想你听到了

translation.en: All right. We're taking my car.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们开我的车

translation.en: And let me know where we're at with that cell phone.
translation.zh: 我想知道在查手机方面的进展

translation.en: Okay, so we did crack Paul's phone.
translation.zh: 我们确实破解了保罗的手机 这并不容易

translation.en: It wasn't easy. With recent numbers already being dead,
translation.zh: 我们确实破解了保罗的手机 这并不容易 许多近期号码已经停用了 我们追踪不到

translation.en: we couldn't trace it, and no registered address.
translation.zh: 许多近期号码已经停用了 我们追踪不到 而且也没有注册地址 但他确实用信用卡付了电话费

translation.en: But he did pay for the phone bill with a credit card
translation.zh: 而且也没有注册地址 但他确实用信用卡付了电话费

translation.en: that also paid the utilities at an address.
translation.zh: 也支付了一个地址的水电费

translation.en: Good lung capacity there, Yale.
translation.zh: 耶鲁 你的肺活量不错

translation.en: What is that, Ivy League swim team?
translation.zh: 你是常春藤盟校游泳队的吗？

translation.en: I put in a request for a warrant.
translation.zh: 我申请了搜查令

translation.en: -Ah, we're not waiting for that. -Gerick.
translation.zh: -啊 我们不是在等那个 -杰里克

translation.en: [man] Something's not right.
translation.zh: 有点不对劲

translation.en: Paul should've called by now.
translation.zh: 保罗现在该打电话了

translation.en: Go back to your room!
translation.zh: 回你们的房间去

translation.en: Be smart. Stay in the back.
translation.zh: 机灵点 呆在后面

translation.en: Don't let anybody see you, okay?
translation.zh: 别让任何人看到你 好吗？

translation.en: Hey! Hey, you! Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！ 嘿！ 你！ 嘿！

translation.en: -[man] Who's that girl? -[bang on door]
translation.zh: 那女孩是谁？

translation.en: -[man] What the fuck are you doing? -[woman] Goddamnit!
translation.zh: -你他妈在做什么？ -该死的

translation.en: Does anyone care that I am working next door?
translation.zh: 有人会在乎我在隔壁工作吗？

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Okay. Let's get goin'.
translation.zh: 好了 我们走吧

translation.en: I always move the truck after being seen outside of this truck stop.
translation.zh: 在这个卡车站外被他们看到后 我总是开走卡车

translation.en: Worst reputation on the road.
translation.zh: 他们在路上的名声很坏

translation.en: Hmm. My brother. He's good.
translation.zh: 嗯 我弟弟的 他球技不错

translation.en: Champ. He'll help.
translation.zh: 棒球冠军 他会帮我们

translation.en: You got a brother?
translation.zh: 你有兄弟吗？

translation.en: Sisters?
translation.zh: 姐妹呢？

translation.en: Guess you don't have no mom or dad either, huh?
translation.zh: 我猜你也没有爸爸妈妈吧？

translation.en: What are you? Baby Jesus?
translation.zh: 你是什么？ 婴儿耶稣吗？

translation.en: What's your name?
translation.zh: 你叫什么名字？

translation.en: Leila. Leila.
translation.zh: -莱拉 -莱拉

translation.en: [man on TV] And that was the farmer who found the body
translation.zh: 这就是那个在25号公路附近的

translation.en: -on a muddy back road off 25. -Mm-hm. I see it.
translation.zh: -泥泞小路上发现尸体的农民 -嗯 我看到了

translation.en: Less than a mile north of the state border.
translation.zh: 距离州边界不到一英里 是啊

translation.en: Yeah. A brutal killing that's hard to grapple with.
translation.zh: 残酷的杀戮 让人难以接受

translation.en: -How did it happen and why? -That little girl's gonna tell on us.
translation.zh: -这是如何发生的 为什么？ -那个小女孩会告发我们

translation.en: No one's gonna tell on nobody.
translation.zh: 没有人会告发任何人

translation.en: [man on TV] The once quiet community is coming to terms with what's happened
translation.zh: 曾经平静的社区正在接受所发生的事

translation.en: as the motive remains unclear in the Mud Murder.
translation.zh: 因为泥浆谋杀案的动机尚不清楚

translation.en: What would warrant such a violent end to a person's life?
translation.zh: 是什么让一个人的生命 以如此残暴的方式结束？

translation.en: [man on radio] Law enforcement is questioning
translation.zh: 执法部门正在质疑

translation.en: -the use of slugs… -Fuck me. Who leaked?
translation.zh: -使用的子弹… -我靠 谁泄露的消息？

translation.en: -…a particularly damaging bullet. -Not me.
translation.zh: -…一种极具杀伤力的子弹 -不是我

translation.en: It's a most unusual find at the crime scene.
translation.zh: 这是犯罪现场最不寻常的发现

translation.en: Some lonesome cowboy wanting his 15 minutes of fame.
translation.zh: 一些孤独的牛仔想出名15分钟

translation.en: …police are looking into the manner.
translation.zh: …警方正在调查此事

translation.en: And this, for now, is all we know about the innocent victim.
translation.zh: 以上为我们对这位无辜受害者 所掌握的信息

translation.en: Innocent, my ass.
translation.zh: 无辜个屁

translation.en: [man on radio] As the investigation proceeds, no stone will be left unturned.
translation.zh: 随着调查的进行 当局将不遗余力

translation.en: You can go to the police, tell 'em what he would've done to you.
translation.zh: 你可以去警察局告诉他们 他要对你做什么？

translation.en: That it was self-defense.
translation.zh: 你那是自卫

translation.en: Hmm?
translation.zh: 嗯？

translation.en: [man on radio] …is where the crime took place,
translation.zh: …是犯罪发生的地方

translation.en: spreading fear on what…
translation.zh: 在什么地方传播恐惧…

translation.en: Just don't bite and kick 'em, all right?
translation.zh: 不要和他们纠缠 好吗？

translation.en: …still hiding in the woods.
translation.zh: …仍然躲在树林里

translation.en: It's not yet confirmed…
translation.zh: 还没有确认…

translation.en: I don't like the police.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢警察

translation.en: …but it is confirmed that the manhunt covers both states.
translation.zh: …但已经证实 搜捕涵盖了这两个州

translation.en: You crying 'cause you're scared, or you crying 'cause that piece of shit is dead?
translation.zh: 你哭是因为害怕 还是因为那个混蛋死了？

translation.en: You know, Leila, you might have shot him, but I left him there to die.
translation.zh: 知道吗 莱拉 开枪的是你 但我袖手旁观让他死去

translation.en: -[breathes deeply] -We're in this together.
translation.zh: 我们是一伙的

translation.en: Oh, we can't cross state lines.
translation.zh: 噢 我们不能越过州界

translation.en: It's too risky with the weigh stations.
translation.zh: 地磅站又太危险了

translation.en: Mm-mm.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: I'll get us to a place where we can't be found.
translation.zh: 我们要去一个没人能找到的地方

translation.en: We'll wait there till my brother has a plan.
translation.zh: 我们会在那里等我弟弟作出计划

translation.en: Yes, Patterson, yes. I know, I know.
translation.zh: 是 帕特森 我知道 我知道

translation.en: You have to see the girl in order for me to get the warrant,
translation.zh: 你必须见到那个女孩 才能让我拿到搜查令

translation.en: even if I need the warrant to get the fucking girl!
translation.zh: 而我需要搜查令 才能得到那该死的女孩

translation.en: You know, we might still be able to get it.
translation.zh: 知道吗 我们也许还能拿到

translation.en: I'm afraid the idiots at legal disagree with you, Yale.
translation.zh: 恐怕法律部门的白痴们 不同意你的观点 耶鲁

translation.en: [chuckles] All right, well, I used to work there, so--
translation.zh: 好吧 我以前在那里工作 所以…

translation.en: I know that. You're the idiot who refused to issue the warrant
translation.zh: 我知道这点 你就是那个拒绝签发搜查令的白痴

translation.en: that would've kept Paul from getting out on bond!
translation.zh: 而搜查令会阻止保罗保释出狱

translation.en: Okay. My buddy caught a glimpse of a young girl
translation.zh: 我的朋友昨天瞥见一个小女孩

translation.en: poking her head out of a blue Peterbilt yesterday.
translation.zh: 从一辆蓝色的彼得皮尔特车里 探出头来

translation.en: Said the truck was headed south on 49.
translation.zh: 他说车子在49号公路向南行驶

translation.en: Called some of our friends down there to be on the lookout.
translation.zh: 打电话给我们的朋友 让他们留意

translation.en: [Dolly on radio] Can't hate 'em much.
translation.zh: 不要太恨他们

translation.en: Give me extra time off when I got my daughter.
translation.zh: 当我和女儿一起时 给我更多的时间

translation.en: 'Cause we all know 34 hours ain't much.
translation.zh: 因为我们都知道34小时并不多

translation.en: [Pattie on radio] Yeah, I just sleep and fuck through 'em.
translation.zh: 因为都被我用来睡觉打炮了

translation.en: -[all laughing] -[Rose] Hey, Sally.
translation.zh: 嘿 萨莉

translation.en: Headin' to Louisville anytime soon?
translation.zh: 很快就要去路易斯维尔吗？

translation.en: [Sally] Nope, not any time soon.
translation.zh: 不 暂时不去

translation.en: [Pattie] Yeah, can't go far from Utica.
translation.zh: 是啊 离尤蒂卡不远

translation.en: -[Sally] That's right. -[Dolly] No shame in that.
translation.zh: -没错 -这并不丢人

translation.en: I only ran local 'round New York when my beau was at Sing Sing.
translation.zh: 我男朋友在新新监狱时 我只在纽约附近工作

translation.en: -[Rose] It's her brother, Dolly. -[Pattie] Beau, brother.
translation.zh: -是她弟 多莉 -男友 弟弟

translation.en: Only difference is one's gonna cheat on ya and not the other.
translation.zh: 唯一区别是一个会出轨而另一个不会

translation.en: -Very funny. -[Pattie] Come on, Sal.
translation.zh: -真有意思 -得了吧 萨尔

translation.en: What's going on with the two-syllable responses?
translation.zh: 这些简短的回应是怎么回事？

translation.en: Uh, sorry, Pattie, been having a rough time.
translation.zh: 抱歉 帕蒂 这段时间不好过

translation.en: [Rose] Wanna tell us about it?
translation.zh: 想跟我们说说吗？

translation.en: [Dolly] I got 500 miles of windshield time and nothin' to do.
translation.zh: 我还得在无所事事的情况下 跑500英里

translation.en: [Pattie] It's okay to ask for help, Sally,
translation.zh: 需要帮助很正常 萨莉

translation.en: we're just a phone call away.
translation.zh: -只需一个呼叫即可 -以后吧

translation.en: Maybe later. All right, ladies, drive safe.
translation.zh: -只需一个呼叫即可 -以后吧 好了 女士们 注意安全

translation.en: -[Pattie] Safe. -[Rose] Safe.
translation.zh: -注意安全 -注意安全

translation.en: [Dolly] Safe.
translation.zh: 注意安全

translation.en: Florida is a dump.
translation.zh: 佛罗里达是个垃圾场

translation.en: I don't care if it's a dump when you can go wherever you want.
translation.zh: 如果能去任何想去的地方 我不在乎它是不是垃圾场

translation.en: Where do you wanna go? Walmart?
translation.zh: 你想去哪里？ 沃尔玛吗？

translation.en: No. The ocean.
translation.zh: 不 去大海

translation.en: 'Cause the ocean goes everywhere.
translation.zh: 因为大海无处不在

translation.en: Hey, stop that! Stop that!
translation.zh: 嘿 停下 停下

translation.en: -That's dangerous. It's dangerous. -[laughing]
translation.zh: 这很危险 很危险

translation.en: Who the fuck cares? It feels good.
translation.zh: 谁他妈在乎？ 这感觉很好

translation.en: The neighbor said she saw girls walking in and out of the house.
translation.zh: 邻居说她看到 女孩们在房子里进进出出

translation.en: "Maybe should've called someone," she says,
translation.zh: “也许该给某人打电话” 她说

translation.en: but doesn't wanna get involved.
translation.zh: 但又不想卷入其中

translation.en: -Hm. -I can't believe people are like this.
translation.zh: -嗯 -真不敢相信人们会这样

translation.en: Well, write a poem about it.
translation.zh: 好吧 写一首关于它的诗

translation.en: Isn't that what you do at Yale?
translation.zh: 这不就是你在耶鲁做的事吗？

translation.en: No. Sometimes we write essays.
translation.zh: 不 有时我们写文章

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, get her statement.
translation.zh: -好吧 给她做笔录 -马上去

translation.en: Ma'am!
translation.zh: 女士

translation.en: One second.
translation.zh: 耽搁你一分钟

translation.en: All right, Patterson. We got what you need.
translation.zh: 帕特森 我们拿到了你需要的

translation.en: [Dennis on phone] I'm worried about you, sis.
translation.zh: 我很担心你 姐姐

translation.en: You should find a place to hide. One of the-- one of those big truck stops.
translation.zh: 你应该找个地方躲起来 在那些… 大一点的卡车停靠站

translation.en: -I know a place we can hide. -Okay, good.
translation.zh: -我知道一个藏身之处 -好 很好

translation.en: You don't think you've been spotted yet, right?
translation.zh: 你觉得你们还没有被发现 对吧？

translation.en: -No. -Good. Good.
translation.zh: -没有 -好 很好

translation.en: -No. -All right. All right.
translation.zh: -没有 -好的 好吧

translation.en: So-so, you'll hide overnight and then you make your way to Arkansas tomorrow.
translation.zh: 那么 你们先躲过晚上 然后你们明天去阿肯色州

translation.en: -Arkansas? -You'll be safer there.
translation.zh: -阿肯色州？ -你到那里去更安全

translation.en: But I'm pickin' you up in Utica tomorrow.
translation.zh: 但我明天要去尤蒂卡接你

translation.en: No, you can't do that. Not with the load you're carrying.
translation.zh: 不 别那么做 你现在有更重要的事

translation.en: But I wanna be there when you get out.
translation.zh: 但我想在你出狱的时候在场

translation.en: I know, I know. That was the plan, but it's not safe, sis.
translation.zh: 我知道 我知道那是原定计划 但这并不安全 老姐

translation.en: These guys aren't fucking around.
translation.zh: 这些人可不是闹着玩

translation.en: Okay. Okay, so what do I do?
translation.zh: 好吧 那我该怎么做？

translation.en: Get across the border and meet you?
translation.zh: 越过州界和你见面吗？

translation.en: [grunts] Where?
translation.zh: 哪里？

translation.en: At home.
translation.zh: 在家里

translation.en: -Home? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -家里？ -嗯

translation.en: I'm not going back home, Dennis.
translation.zh: 丹尼斯 我不会回去的

translation.en: I haven't been there since I was 15, I… I can't go back.
translation.zh: 我15岁后就没再回去了 我不能回去

translation.en: Dad's dead.
translation.zh: 爸爸已经死了

translation.en: I know, I paid for his fucking casket. I'm not going.
translation.zh: 我知道 是我给他付的棺材钱 我不回去

translation.en: It's the only safe place I know, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉 这是我所知唯一安全的地方

translation.en: Shit, someone-- someone's coming.
translation.zh: 该死 有人… 有人来了

translation.en: -I-I gotta go. -[line hangs up]
translation.zh: 我得挂了

translation.en: We found a dog in the basement.
translation.zh: 我们在地下室发现一条狗

translation.en: We need a few minutes to tranquilize it.
translation.zh: 我们需要几分钟让它安静下来

translation.en: Okay. Saunders?
translation.zh: -好吧 -桑德斯？

translation.en: Neighbors say they saw the girls walking around the neighborhood.
translation.zh: 邻居们说 他们看到女孩们在附近走动

translation.en: I don't understand.
translation.zh: 我不明白 她们为什么

translation.en: Why didn't they… call the police?
translation.zh: 我不明白 她们为什么 不报警？

translation.en: Ask for help? Something.
translation.zh: 寻求帮助之类？

translation.en: These kids have been fucked over by the system since the day they were born.
translation.zh: 这些孩子从出生那天起 就被这个体制毁了

translation.en: They don't call the police.
translation.zh: 她们不会报警

translation.en: Nobody gives a shit and they know it.
translation.zh: 她们知道没人在乎她们

translation.en: They also know that if they step out of line what happens.
translation.zh: 她们也知道如果她们越界会怎么样

translation.en: That's what the basement is for.
translation.zh: 这就是地下室的用途

translation.en: -A kid had been in this cage. -What?
translation.zh: -一个孩子被关在这个笼子里 -什么？

translation.en: A kid had been in this cage. Bolted to the wall.
translation.zh: 一个孩子曾被关在这个笼子里 用螺栓固定在墙上

translation.en: Dog was running loose.
translation.zh: 狗是放养的

translation.en: From the looks of the dog, it had been trained to be aggressive.
translation.zh: 从狗的样子来看 它受过攻击性训练

translation.en: Traces of blood on the bolts.
translation.zh: 螺栓上有血迹

translation.en: Looks like someone tried to claw their way out.
translation.zh: 看起来像是有人试图从中逃脱

translation.en: Fresh. Couple of days.
translation.zh: 血迹很新鲜 没两天

translation.en: We just missed them.
translation.zh: 我们错过了她们

translation.en: Clothes in the cage.
translation.zh: 笼子里的衣服

translation.en: Pant size, dress size.
translation.zh: 根据裤子和连衣裙尺寸

translation.en: She's probably about five feet. Young.
translation.zh: 她大概有五英尺高 很幼小

translation.en: And she found a pencil to doodle with.
translation.zh: 她还找到一支铅笔来涂鸦

translation.en: You know this place?
translation.zh: 你知道这个地方吗？

translation.en: This truck stop's so big…
translation.zh: 这个卡车站太大了…

translation.en: even the pimps don't know their way around.
translation.zh: 甚至连皮条客在这里都会迷路

translation.en: We can hide here till tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我们可以躲到明天

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Let's go over the ground rules.
translation.zh: 我们复习一下基本规则

translation.en: Hair spray, AKA pepper spray.
translation.zh: 发胶 又名胡椒喷雾剂

translation.en: Here.
translation.zh: 给

translation.en: Man's coat stays on the driver's seat.
translation.zh: 男士外套放在驾驶座上

translation.en: Makes them think a guy lives here.
translation.zh: 让他们以为有男人住在这里

translation.en: At night, curtains closed, lights off.
translation.zh: 到晚上 拉上窗帘 关掉灯

translation.en: Lights on is an invitation. Right?
translation.zh: 开灯会被误以为是一种邀请 对吧？

translation.en: Someone knocks, we don't open.
translation.zh: 如果有人敲门 不要开

translation.en: Doors locked. Windows up.
translation.zh: 先锁上车门 再打开车窗

translation.en: Seatbelt wrapped through the door handle
translation.zh: 把安全带穿过车门把手

translation.en: and fastened when we're sleepin'.
translation.zh: 并在我们睡觉时系好

translation.en: You sleep up top. I'm on the bottom. Got it?
translation.zh: 你睡上铺 我睡下面 知道了吗？

translation.en: -Got it. -I do the shoppin'.
translation.zh: -知道了 -我负责购物

translation.en: But you do the dishes. You stay here.
translation.zh: 但你要洗碗 你留在这里

translation.en: Don't let nobody see you, okay?
translation.zh: 别让任何人看见你 好吗？

translation.en: -All right. -That's it.
translation.zh: -好吧 -就这样

translation.en: But I need to go to the store.
translation.zh: 但是我需要去商店

translation.en: Uh, didn't you hear what I said?
translation.zh: 你没听到我说的吗？

translation.en: Your underwear is huge on me.
translation.zh: 你的内衣对我来说太大了

translation.en: Would you prefer me to walk around with 'em gathered in my ass?
translation.zh: 你想让我在外面时被人紧盯着看吗？

translation.en: This it?
translation.zh: 这件吗？

translation.en: It's for my niece.
translation.zh: 给我侄女买的

translation.en: Well, how do you like that?
translation.zh: 嗯 你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: I see you more than I see my own family,
translation.zh: 我看到你比看到我自己的家人还多

translation.en: and I didn't even know you had a niece.
translation.zh: 我甚至不知道你还有侄女

translation.en: Oh, come on, Patterson, don't give me this shit about priority of resources, man.
translation.zh: 噢 得了吧 帕特森 别跟我扯资源优先权的事 老兄

translation.en: This is a fucking priority. Fuck!
translation.zh: 这是优先事项 妈的

translation.en: Fuck!
translation.zh: 妈的

translation.en: -Yeah. -Fuck!
translation.zh: -是的 -妈的

translation.en: You've been at this, what, 30, 40 years?
translation.zh: 你当警察有30年还是40年了？

translation.en: Fifty.
Still gets you riled up, huh?
translation.zh: 还是让你感到愤怒？

translation.en: How the hell can it not?
translation.zh: 怎么不会呢？

translation.en: Why don't they run?
translation.zh: 她们为什么不逃跑？

translation.en: You know? Because I would.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？ 换做是我 我就会跑

translation.en: Anything to get away from that hellhole.
translation.zh: 只要能逃离那个火坑

translation.en: [chuckles] Fuck no. You-- you'd be locked in a basement.
translation.zh: 别想了…你会被锁在地下室

translation.en: No, you wouldn't run. You'd stay.
translation.zh: 不 你不会跑 你会留下来

translation.en: Try to play the game. Survive.
translation.zh: 去试着玩幸存者游戏

translation.en: What the fuck would you live on out there? Grass? Clover?
translation.zh: 你逃到外面靠什么为生？ 草？ 四叶草吗？

translation.en: Best case scenario, you're found and brought right back into the system.
translation.zh: 最好的情况是你被发现 并被带回体制中

translation.en: Then you'd run again.
translation.zh: 然后你会再次逃跑

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Most of these kids are held captive just a few miles from where they grew up.
translation.zh: 多数的孩子都被囚禁在 离她们长大的地方只有几英里之处

translation.en: In their minds they got nowhere to go.
translation.zh: 她们觉得自己无处可去

translation.en: And for a lot of 'em, that's true.
translation.zh: 对她们中大多数来说 这是事实

translation.en: [female agent] Same hair as in the basement.
translation.zh: 和地下室的头发一样

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Shouldn't we get-- shouldn't we get rid of that?
translation.zh: 我们不是… 不是应该丢掉它吗？

translation.en: Not an option. My mom gave it to my brother before she died.
translation.zh: 这可不行 我妈妈在去世前把它给了我弟

translation.en: They find this… [chuckles]
translation.zh: 要是他们发现这…

translation.en: they've found us anyway.
translation.zh: 他们就会找到我们

translation.en: You fire it, you clean it.
translation.zh: 你开的枪 你来把它清干净

translation.en: I see his eyes all the time.
translation.zh: 我一直看着他的眼睛

translation.en: You kill someone 'cause you wanna be free,
translation.zh: 你杀人是因为你想获得自由

translation.en: but then he still gets you.
translation.zh: 但他还是抓住了你

translation.en: How'd you learn to shoot?
translation.zh: 你怎么学会开枪的？

translation.en: This guy Cooper.
translation.zh: 是个叫库珀的人

translation.en: My mom left me with him when she went to work.
translation.zh: 我妈妈上班时把我留在他那里

translation.en: He was buildin' an armory.
translation.zh: 他当时在建一个军火库

translation.en: He always said if the world went to shit… he'd be ready.
translation.zh: 他总是说如果世界变得很糟… 他必须为此准备好

translation.en: Do you ever feel lonely?
translation.zh: 你曾经感到孤独吗？

translation.en: Always.
translation.zh: 一直都是如此

translation.en: [woman] Just a few gallons of gas.
translation.zh: 只要几加仑汽油

translation.en: -Oh, you want gas? -Please, lady.
translation.zh: -噢 你要汽油吗？ -女士 求求你

translation.en: Well, bring your car! I'll give you some gas.
translation.zh: 好吧 把你的车开来 我给你加点油

translation.en: I just want a few dollars. It'd be better so I can buy--
translation.zh: 我只想要一些钱 这样我就可以买…

translation.en: Oh, now you want money! Ask for money! We're all struggling here!
translation.zh: 噢 现在你想要钱了？ 要钱了？ -大家都很辛苦！ -我只想带我的孩子去…

translation.en: [woman] I just wanna take my kids to the--
translation.zh: -大家都很辛苦！ -我只想带我的孩子去…

translation.en: [Sally] You got kids? Go take care of them.
translation.zh: 你有孩子吗？ 那就去照顾他们

translation.en: -See? -Yeah, I see.
translation.zh: -看到了吗？ -是 看到了

translation.en: God… And what do you want me to do?
translation.zh: 天哪… 你想让我做什么？

translation.en: -Well-- -Resources are so fucking scarce,
translation.zh: -嗯… -资源是如此的匮乏

translation.en: they're telling us to prioritize only infants and toddlers.
translation.zh: 他们告诉我们只优先考虑婴幼儿

translation.en: Patterson, we can catch these fucking guys.
translation.zh: 帕特森 我们可以抓住 这些该死的家伙

translation.en: It's you and Sterling, Gerick. That is it.
translation.zh: 杰里克 只有你和斯特林 仅此而已

translation.en: If we don't bring 'em down now, they just set up some place else and then what?
translation.zh: 如果我们现在不抓到他们 他们会继续作恶 然后呢？

translation.en: Ten more girls? Fifteen?
translation.zh: 还有十个女孩？ 十五个？

translation.en: Trafficking will not go away until people stop buying, Gerick.
translation.zh: 在人们停止购买前 人口贩卖是不会消失的 杰里克

translation.en: We know that. All right?
translation.zh: 我们都知道这点 对吧？

translation.en: We get these guys and someone else is just gonna satisfy the demand.
translation.zh: 我们抓到这些人 其他人就会填补空缺 满足这个需求

translation.en: It could be your daughter, Patterson.
translation.zh: 帕特森 这也可能是你女儿

translation.en: [boy] Hi. I saw you earlier today.
translation.zh: 嗨 我今天早些时候见过你

translation.en: Uh, I was just wondering if you wanted to come over.
translation.zh: 呃 我只是想知道你是否想过来

translation.en: Uh, my mom's making pancakes, so I just thought…
translation.zh: 呃 我妈妈在做薄煎饼 所以我想…

translation.en: Thanks, but I don't have time.
translation.zh: 谢谢 但我没有时间

translation.en: M-maybe later? We're in the pink RV over by the store.
translation.zh: 或许待会儿呢？ 我们在商店旁边的粉红色房车里

translation.en: Okay, well, maybe later.
translation.zh: 好吧 也许待会儿吧

translation.en: Bye then. See ya.
translation.zh: 那么再见 再见

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: Who knew she could still shine.
translation.zh: 想不到你还挺有魅力

translation.en: You said he would help.
translation.zh: 你说过他会帮忙的

translation.en: You don't read other people's letters.
translation.zh: 你不应该看别人的信件

translation.en: He's in fucking jail, so how's he gonna help us?
translation.zh: 他在该死的监狱里 他要怎么帮我们？

translation.en: What do you mean? "Us"?
translation.zh: 你什么意思？ “我们”？

translation.en: You and me are not "us."
translation.zh: 你和我不是“我们”

translation.en: The only "us" I know is me and my brother.
translation.zh: 只有我和我弟才是“我们”

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me he was in jail?
translation.zh: 你为什么不告诉我他在坐牢？

translation.en: He's getting out of jail tomorrow.
translation.zh: 他明天就要出狱了

translation.en: 'Cause of you, I can't be there.
translation.zh: 因为你 我没办法到场

translation.en: You could've just told me.
translation.zh: 你可以直接告诉我的

translation.en: None of your fucking business.
translation.zh: 这不关你的事

translation.en: Like looking for a needle in a haystack.
translation.zh: 这就像在大海捞针

translation.en: A semi is no needle though.
translation.zh: 半挂车可不是针

translation.en: It stands out pretty much anywhere.
translation.zh: 它在任何地方都很显眼

translation.en: If I was them…
translation.zh: 如果我是他们…

translation.en: I'd duck into someplace familiar and just lay low.
translation.zh: 我会躲到熟悉的地方然后低调行事

translation.en: And a young girl with a trucker might stand out just enough
translation.zh: 一个卡车司机和一个小女孩一起 足以引人注意

translation.en: for someone to have taken notice.
translation.zh: 足以引人注意

translation.en: -Yeah. -Wait.
translation.zh: -是啊 -等等

translation.en: You're not suggesting we go analog and go to every truck stop ever?
translation.zh: 你不会是建议我们 去每一个卡车站吧？

translation.en: -'Cause there's-- there's many. -There aren't that many.
translation.zh: -因为有… 有很多 -没那么多

translation.en: And a guy like this won't stray far from his comfort zone.
translation.zh: 这样的人不会远离他熟悉的地方

translation.en: You're driving. Let's go.
translation.zh: 你来开车 走吧

translation.en: -Hello. -[Dennis over phone] Oh, shit.
translation.zh: -喂 -噢 该死

translation.en: I was worried about you. I worked it out.
translation.zh: 我很担心你 我想到办法了

translation.en: We gotta get the girl back to them, and they'll let us off the hook.
translation.zh: 我们必须把女孩带回他们那里 他们会放过我们

translation.en: -Where you at? -Sherrigan's.
translation.zh: -你在哪里？ -谢尔根

translation.en: Heading to Arkansas tomorrow like you told me.
translation.zh: 如你所说 明天去阿肯色州

translation.en: Okay. Okay. Everything good there?
translation.zh: 好 好的 你那里都还好吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. All's good. -Great. Okay.
translation.zh: -好 都还好 -太好了 好

translation.en: -I love you. -I love you, too.
translation.zh: -我爱你 -我也爱你

translation.en: Just keep the girl close. She's our lifeline, sis.
translation.zh: 看紧那女孩 她是我们的生命线 姐姐

translation.en: -Yeah. -Okay, I'll see you tomorrow.
translation.zh: -好 -好的 明天见

translation.en: -Yeah. -I think we're gonna be okay.
translation.zh: -嗯 -我想我们会没事的

translation.en: Hello. Okay.
translation.zh: 喂 好的

translation.en: All right, we're on our way.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们在路上了

translation.en: We got 'em. Take a left.
translation.zh: 我们找到他们了 左拐

translation.en: All right, all right, all right, let's see.
translation.zh: 好吧 好吧 来看看

translation.en: Okay. Rock, okay. It starts with rock.
translation.zh: 好 石头 好 从石头开始

translation.en: And then scissors cuts paper.
translation.zh: 然后剪刀剪布

translation.en: Rock, paper, scissors, shoot.
translation.zh: 石头 布 剪刀 出

translation.en: Rock, pa--
translation.zh: 石头 布…

translation.en: Rock, paper, scissors, gun, shoot.
translation.zh: 石头 布 剪刀 枪 出

translation.en: [chuckles] Rock, paper, scissors, shoot.
translation.zh: 石头 布 剪刀 出

translation.en: -What the heck? -[chuckles] Okay, rock, shoot.
translation.zh: 搞什么鬼？ 好的 石头 出

translation.en: What you got there, Yale? Toothbrush?
translation.zh: 耶鲁 你那里有什么收获？ 牙刷吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I drink a lot of coffee.
translation.zh: 是啊 我喝很多咖啡

translation.en: Okay. All right.
translation.zh: 好 好吧

translation.en: It's our fourth stop today.
translation.zh: 这是我们今天的第四站

translation.en: What's gonna be different about this one?
translation.zh: 这次会有什么不同？

translation.en: You wanted field work. This is the field.
translation.zh: 你想要实地经验 这就是实地

translation.en: Sorry, it's not as sexy as you thought it would be.
translation.zh: 抱歉 它没有你想像的那么美妙

translation.en: [grunts] Let's see what we find.
translation.zh: 看看我们会有什么发现吧

translation.en: Shot of whiskey.
translation.zh: 一杯威士忌

translation.en: [woman, outside RV] My youngest is sick
translation.zh: 我最小的孩子病了 我们只需要几块钱搭公交车

translation.en: and we just need a few dollars for the bus.
translation.zh: 我们只需要几块钱搭公交车

translation.en: You have kids, right? You know what I'm goin' through.
translation.zh: 你有孩子 对吗？ 你知道我在经历什么

translation.en: Excuse me, sir. I have--
translation.zh: 对不起 先生 我…

translation.en: I have a sick mother at home and my car broke down.
translation.zh: 我母亲生病在家 我的车坏了

translation.en: I really… I just need a few bucks.
translation.zh: 我真的… 我只需要几块钱

translation.en: You got kids? You got kids? You got kids, don't you?
translation.zh: 你有孩子吗？ 有孩子吗？ 你有孩子对吗？

translation.en: -Hi, Mom. -Hey, baby.
translation.zh: -嗨 妈妈 -嘿 宝贝

translation.en: [sighs] Thank you. Thank you, ma'am.
translation.zh: 谢谢 谢谢你 女士

translation.en: -Okay, now. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -现在好了吧 -谢谢

translation.en: -Thank you. [cries] -All right.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -好吧 谢谢

translation.en: [woman] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Do you ever feel lonely?
translation.zh: 你曾经感到孤独吗？

translation.en: Mm, no, not really.
translation.zh: 嗯 不 还好

translation.en: Mm, how about, like, when you're with people?
translation.zh: 嗯 你和别人在一起的时候呢？

translation.en: That maybe you'll always be lonely
translation.zh: 又或者你一直觉得孤独

translation.en: because no one knows the world the same as you do?
translation.zh: 因为没有人像你一样了解这个世界？

translation.en: I haven't seen any little girl.
translation.zh: 我没见过任何小女孩

translation.en: I am so sure I would've noticed that,
translation.zh: 我确信我会注意到的

translation.en: but I only work certain shifts.
translation.zh: 但我轮班工作

translation.en: Well, what about personnel?
translation.zh: 那么 其他工作人员呢？

translation.en: Is there anyone here consistently
translation.zh: 这里有没有人

translation.en: who might've noticed something suspicious?
translation.zh: 会一直注意到一些可疑的事？

translation.en: Well, I think your best bet might be to go over there
translation.zh: 哦 我想你最好去那边的酒吧 去找酒保问问

translation.en: to the bar and talk to the bartender.
translation.zh: 去找酒保问问

translation.en: He knows most everybody coming in and outta here.
translation.zh: 他几乎认识这里的每个人

translation.en: And the regulars, they're always around.
translation.zh: 还有常客 他们总是在附近

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Excuse me, ma'am.
translation.zh: 打扰下 女士

translation.en: -Yeah. -Excuse me, ma'am.
translation.zh: -嗯 -打扰了 女士

translation.en: What can I do for you…
translation.zh: 我能为你做什么？

translation.en: Officer Finley Sterling?
translation.zh: 芬利·斯特林警官？

translation.en: Is that a real name?
translation.zh: 是真名吗？

translation.en: Some of my friends call me Yale, if that makes things easier for you.
translation.zh: 拗口的话 有些朋友管我叫耶鲁

translation.en: We're just looking for a truck driver with a little girl with him.
translation.zh: 我们在找一个 带着一个小女孩的卡车司机

translation.en: Huh?
translation.zh: 嗯？

translation.en: Uh, about five foot tall.
translation.zh: 呃 大约五英尺高

translation.en: Uh, dark brown hair. You seen anybody like that?
translation.zh: 呃 深棕色头发 你见过这样的人吗？

translation.en: Nope.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Okay, thank you. Have a good night.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢 祝你晚安

translation.en: And you.
translation.zh: 你也是

translation.en: [whispers] Sally.
translation.zh: 萨莉

translation.en: -Hey. -I'm okay.
translation.zh: -嘿 -我很好

translation.en: -You okay? -Good.
translation.zh: -你还好吗？ -很好

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay. Do you live around here?
translation.zh: 好 你住在这附近吗？

translation.en: -[mutters] -[woman] No?
translation.zh: 不是吗？

translation.en: What's your name?
translation.zh: 你叫什么名字？

translation.en: Okay. Let's get you back to your truck, okay?
translation.zh: 好 我们送你回卡车上 好吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -You think you can show us the way?
translation.zh: -好 -你能给我们指路吗？

translation.en: Oh. Watch your step, hun. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 噢 亲爱的 小心脚下

translation.en: Had a little too much to drink tonight, huh?
translation.zh: 今晚有点喝多了 是吗？

translation.en: -Happens to the best of us, right? -[women chuckle]
translation.zh: 我们中最能喝的人也醉了吧？

translation.en: Which one's your truck, huh?
translation.zh: 哪辆是你的卡车？

translation.en: Is it this one?
translation.zh: 这辆吗？

translation.en: All right, let's get your keys.
translation.zh: 好吧 给我车钥匙

translation.en: Where's your keys, huh?
translation.zh: 你的钥匙呢？

translation.en: -Watch her, Tesz. -Got her.
translation.zh: -看着她 特兹 -没问题

translation.en: -There's no one in here. -What?
translation.zh: -这里没有人 -什么？

translation.en: I'm sayin' there's no fucking girl in here.
translation.zh: 我是说这里没有该死的女孩

translation.en: Oh, fuck. Where is she?
translation.zh: 噢 妈的 她在哪里？

translation.en: -[groans] -[Tesz] Huh?
translation.zh: 嗯？

translation.en: I said, where the fuck is the girl?
translation.zh: 我说 那女孩在他妈哪里？

translation.en: [woman] What a dump.
translation.zh: 这里简直是个垃圾堆

translation.en: There's nothing in here but crap.
translation.zh: 这里除了垃圾什么都没有

translation.en: What? You sure?
translation.zh: 什么？ 你确定？

translation.en: What is all this shit?
translation.zh: 这什么鬼东西？

translation.en: -What the hell is this, huh? -[Tesz] Where's the girl, huh?
translation.zh: -这什么鬼东西？ -那个女孩在哪里？

translation.en: Where the fuck is the girl?
translation.zh: 那女孩在哪里？

translation.en: -I don't--I don't know. -Wake up, wake up.
translation.zh: -我不… 不知道 -醒醒 醒

translation.en: Wake up, get up.
translation.zh: 醒醒 起来

translation.en: Show me where-- [muttering]
translation.zh: 告诉我在哪里…

translation.en: Oh, shit!
translation.zh: 噢 该死

translation.en: -What the fuck? -She's shot a guy before.
translation.zh: -搞什么？ -她开枪杀过一个人

translation.en: Hey, Deborah. Get out here.
translation.zh: 嘿 黛博拉 离开这里

translation.en: What the fuck, Tesz?
translation.zh: 搞什么 特兹？

translation.en: [pants] Shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: [man] Hey, what's going on out there?
translation.zh: 嘿 外面怎么了？

translation.en: [man two] Shut the fuck up! I'm tryin' to sleep!
translation.zh: 他妈的闭嘴 我要睡觉了

translation.en: Come on, Sally.
translation.zh: 萨莉 来吧

translation.en: -[horn honking] -Get in the truck.
translation.zh: 到车里去

translation.en: Here.
translation.zh: 这里

translation.en: -Come on! Get in the truck! -[man] She's got a gun.
translation.zh: -快点 进车里 -她拿着枪

translation.en: [man two] Hey, careful.
translation.zh: 嘿 小心点

translation.en: [man three] I'm tired of this shit. Tryin' to sleep over here.
translation.zh: 我受够这鬼事了 我想睡会儿

translation.en: Get the fuck outta here!
translation.zh: 你们他妈的滚开

translation.en: [Deborah] You fucked up my eye, bitch.
translation.zh: 你伤到我的眼睛了 婊子

translation.en: -Fuck you! -[man] Shut the fuck--
translation.zh: -去你的 -你他妈闭嘴…

translation.en: -[horn honking] -[woman] Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Get the car, get the car.
translation.zh: 去开车 去开车

translation.en: -Straight out. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -径直开出去 -好

translation.en: What the fuck? Is that her truck?
translation.zh: -搞什么？ -是她的卡车吗？

translation.en: -What the fuck? -Is she gonna fucking hit us?
translation.zh: -搞什么？ -她是不是要撞我们？

translation.en: Keep her there. Hold her.
translation.zh: 把她留下 抓住她

translation.en: Again.
translation.zh: 再来

translation.en: -We need to talk to her. -Her?
translation.zh: -我们需要和她谈谈 -她？

translation.en: It's a blue cab truck. Keep it in sight.
translation.zh: 是辆蓝色货车 跟上

translation.en: -[Finley] You get the plates? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你记住车牌了吗？ -嗯

translation.en: -All right. -No!
translation.zh: -好吧 -不

translation.en: -Wait. What the fuck are you doing? -She's getting away!
translation.zh: -等等 你他妈在干什么？ -她要跑了

translation.en: We don't wanna get into a fucking car chase with the police!
translation.zh: 我们可不能和警察来场该死的飙车

translation.en: [Finley] Calm down, all right?
translation.zh: 冷静点 好吗？

translation.en: I don't want you to hurt yourself.
translation.zh: 我不想你伤害自己

translation.en: Pull right.
translation.zh: 往右

translation.en: [Sally] Straighten out!
translation.zh: 打直

translation.en: Fuck!
translation.zh: 妈的

translation.en: [woman on radio] In other news, the police
translation.zh: 另一则消息是 在昨晚谢尔根卡车站发生的事件后 警方仍在

translation.en: are still on the lookout for a light blue Peterbilt truck
translation.zh: 在昨晚谢尔根卡车站发生的事件后 警方仍在

translation.en: after the incident at Sherrigan's truck stop last night.
translation.zh: 寻找一辆浅蓝色彼得皮尔特卡车

translation.en: License plate F-three-one--
translation.zh: 车牌号是F-31…

translation.en: -We should get going. -Oh, no.
translation.zh: -我们该走了 -不…

translation.en: Right. [sighs]
translation.zh: 你说得对

translation.en: Can we go to this place?
translation.zh: 我们能去这里吗？

translation.en: It's not far from here.
translation.zh: 离这儿不远

translation.en: I just wanna pick up my jacket.
translation.zh: 我只想去拿我的外套

translation.en: There ain't nobody there.
translation.zh: 那里一个人都没有 所以…

translation.en: So… no one's gonna see us.
translation.zh: 没人会看见我们

translation.en: How the hell can they be lost, man? They're in a blue rig.
translation.zh: 她们究竟是怎么不见的？ 她们可是开着一辆蓝色大卡车

translation.en: Kinda hard to miss.
translation.zh: 非常引人注目

translation.en: All the roads around here aren't even on the map, sir.
translation.zh: 这附近的所有道路 都不在地图上 长官

translation.en: Well, get a chopper in the air, man, for fuck's sake.
translation.zh: 好吧 看在老天份上 出动直升机吧 老兄

translation.en: You think we got a chopper around here?
translation.zh: 你觉得我们这里有直升机吗？

translation.en: Get a news chopper, I don't care! -Weather chopper! -[knocking]
translation.zh: 我不管 找一架新闻直升机 什么的

translation.en: -What? -She's ready to talk.
translation.zh: -什么？ -她准备招了

translation.en: You know, sometimes people help you more if you're not an asshole.
translation.zh: 知道吗 如果你不那么混蛋 有时候人们更愿意帮你

translation.en: -I'm only an asshole to you. -You're an asshole to everyone.
translation.zh: -我只对你来说是个混蛋 -你对每个人来说都是混蛋

translation.en: And you.
translation.zh: 还有你

translation.en: [Tesz] I don't work for nobody, sir.
translation.zh: 我不为任何人工作 先生

translation.en: Some woman asked if we wanted some cash.
translation.zh: 有个女人问我们想不想挣钱

translation.en: I don't know the bitch. Don't know the trucker lady.
translation.zh: 我不认识那婊子 不认识那个女卡车司机

translation.en: And don't know the girl who took a swing at me.
translation.zh: 也不认识那个朝我挥棒子的女孩

translation.en: The girl took a swing at you?
translation.zh: 那女孩向你挥棒子？

translation.en: Yeah. She was the one holding the gun, too.
translation.zh: 对 拿着枪的人也是她

translation.en: You'll like our trailer. It's nice.
translation.zh: 你会喜欢我们的拖车 它很不错

translation.en: Our trailer is bright blue, so you'll know it when you see it.
translation.zh: 我们的拖车是亮蓝色 你看到它的时候就知道了

translation.en: My mom painted it.
translation.zh: 我妈妈刷的漆

translation.en: Your friend Cooper's place?
translation.zh: 那是你朋友库珀家？

translation.en: Yeah. That was his place.
translation.zh: 是啊 那是他的房子

translation.en: Our trailer-- our trailer's right behind the pink flamingo,
translation.zh: 我们的拖车… 就在那辆粉红火烈鸟后面

translation.en: so you'll see it in just a second.
translation.zh: 你马上就会看到了

translation.en: It was just prescriptions at first.
translation.zh: 起初只是处方药

translation.en: She only took what the fucking doctor told her to take.
translation.zh: 她只吃医生让她吃的东西

translation.en: I didn't wanna stay at another group home.
translation.zh: 我不想呆在另一个集体之家

translation.en: So I ran.
translation.zh: 所以我跑了

translation.en: My mom loved me.
translation.zh: 我妈妈爱我

translation.en: But that stuff made her happy every time.
translation.zh: 但那东西每次都让她很开心

translation.en: You know, I've never actually been to the ocean before.
translation.zh: 知道吗 我以前从未真正去过大海

translation.en: Well, you're lucky to know where you wanna go.
translation.zh: 嗯 你很幸运知道你想去哪里

translation.en: I only know what I'm running from.
translation.zh: 我只知道我在躲避什么

translation.en: You out?
translation.zh: 你出狱了吗？

translation.en: [Dennis over phone] Yeah. Finally.
translation.zh: 是的 总算出来了

translation.en: You're at the house? Yeah. Yeah, I'm home.
translation.zh: -你在家吗？ -是的 我回家了

translation.en: I thought you'd be here already.
translation.zh: 我以为你已经到了

translation.en: I'm so nervous, Sal, about the girl, you know.
translation.zh: 萨尔 你知道吗？ 那女孩让我紧张

translation.en: We gotta get her to them tonight. They're gonna let me know what time.
translation.zh: 我们今晚要带她去见他们 他们会告诉我时间

translation.en: You promise me you'll get her home.
translation.zh: 你答应我你会送她回家

translation.en: Oh, shit… They're-they're calling me again.
translation.zh: 噢 该死… 他们又给我来电了

translation.en: -Sal, I-- -[line cuts out]
translation.zh: 萨尔 我…

translation.en: Dad used to beat us, and Dennis took the brunt of it
translation.zh: 我爸过去经常打我们 丹尼斯为了保护我 挨了很多打

translation.en: for as long as he could to protect me.
translation.zh: 丹尼斯为了保护我 挨了很多打

translation.en: And it-- it hurt him. It carved a piece out of him.
translation.zh: 这… 不但伤害了他 也伤了他的心

translation.en: It's my turn to take care of him this time.
translation.zh: 这次轮到我照顾他了

translation.en: -[beeping] -[automated voice] Joining conference now.
translation.zh: 立即加入群聊

translation.en: [Rose] Welcome, Sally. Didn't think you'd make it on here today.
translation.zh: 欢迎你 萨莉 没想到你今天能来

translation.en: How was it pickin' up your brother?
translation.zh: 接你弟弟的事怎样了？

translation.en: Hey, ladies. I got a favor to ask you.
translation.zh: 嘿 女士们 我想请你们帮个忙

translation.en: [Dolly] No way! Did he fuck up already?
translation.zh: 不会吧 他已经开始搞砸事情了吗？

translation.en: It's not for my brother. It's for me.
translation.zh: 这不是帮我弟 是帮我

translation.en: The truck's been sighted! Positive match on the plates!
translation.zh: 卡车被发现了 车牌号已确定

translation.en: Step out of the vehicle, ma'am.
translation.zh: 女士 下车

translation.en: This a vehicle inspection, sir?
translation.zh: 警官 是车辆检查吗？

translation.en: Please step out, ma'am.
translation.zh: 女士 请下车

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: CDL, please.
translation.zh: 请出示合法驾照

translation.en: Follow me.
translation.zh: 跟我来

translation.en: Give me a moment, will ya?
translation.zh: 请给我一点时间 好吗？

translation.en: All right if I call you Sally?
translation.zh: 我叫你萨莉好吗？

translation.en: We're looking for a young girl.
translation.zh: 我们在找一个小女孩

translation.en: Dark hair.
translation.zh: 深色头发

translation.en: Thought you might've seen her.
translation.zh: 我想你可能见过她

translation.en: You and your partner asked around the bar at Sherrigan's last night.
translation.zh: 你和你的搭档 昨晚在谢尔根酒吧问过了

translation.en: I haven't seen her, sir.
translation.zh: 我没见过她 先生

translation.en: What happened to your face?
translation.zh: 你的脸怎么了？

translation.en: Didn't I tell you I was at the bar last night?
translation.zh: 我没告诉你我昨晚在酒吧吗？

translation.en: And it looks like your truck took a beating for ya.
translation.zh: 看起来你的卡车也跟你吃了不少苦头

translation.en: Was she there, too?
translation.zh: 她也在吗？

translation.en: You know it, sir. She and me, we're one.
translation.zh: 你知道的 先生 她和我 我们是一起的

translation.en: Where are you from?
translation.zh: 你从哪里来的？

translation.en: Nowhere, and everywhere.
translation.zh: 无处不在 处处皆然

translation.en: That's America for you.
translation.zh: 这是美国人的特色

translation.en: But you've been here a long time.
translation.zh: 但你已经在这里很久了

translation.en: Where do you live?
translation.zh: 你住在哪里？

translation.en: Right here, sir, in my truck.
translation.zh: 就在这里 先生 在我的卡车里

translation.en: [smacks lips] I hear ya. My car often becomes my bed.
translation.zh: 我听说过 我的车也经常成我的床

translation.en: I don't mind.
translation.zh: 我不介意

translation.en: Solitude is nice.
translation.zh: 独自一人也不错

translation.en: Well, sorry to bother you. Have a nice ride.
translation.zh: 很抱歉打扰你 祝你旅途愉快

translation.en: Where you headed?
translation.zh: 你要去哪里？

translation.en: Across the river.
translation.zh: 河对岸

translation.en: -Arkansas? -Arkansas.
translation.zh: -阿肯色州？ -阿肯色州

translation.en: I figured.
translation.zh: 我想也是

translation.en: Look, Sally…
translation.zh: 听着 萨莉…

translation.en: there are some bad people out, wantin' to hurt that girl.
translation.zh: 外面有一些坏人 想伤害那个女孩

translation.en: The police are looking for a killer.
translation.zh: 警方正在寻找凶手

translation.en: That's not what I'm after.
translation.zh: 但那不是我想要的

translation.en: I just want to help her and whoever's trying to be good to her.
translation.zh: 我只是想帮她 以及那些对她好的人

translation.en: You understand?
translation.zh: 你明白吗？

translation.en: Here. This is my number.
translation.zh: 给你 这是我的号码

translation.en: I don't trust the system any more than you do,
translation.zh: 我和你一样不信任这个体制

translation.en: but some of us are not all bad.
translation.zh: 但这之中不全都是坏人

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: All right. Well, have a nice ride.
translation.zh: 好吧 好 祝你旅途愉快

translation.en: [grunts] Yeah.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: You wanna tell me what you're not telling them?
translation.zh: 你想告诉我你没告诉他们什么吗？

translation.en: She's with the girl all right.
translation.zh: 她和那个女孩在一起

translation.en: But that lady trucker's not who we're looking for.
translation.zh: 但那个女卡车司机不是我们要找的人

translation.en: I think the girl was safe here with her.
translation.zh: 我认为那女孩和她在一起是安全的

translation.en: Last thing we need is a bunch of cops running after them with guns drawn.
translation.zh: 我们最不需要的 就是一群警察拔枪追赶她们

translation.en: Oh, we'll keep an eye on her.
translation.zh: 噢 我们会盯着她的

translation.en: Let her guide us to whoever she's running away from.
translation.zh: 让她引着我们找到她想躲避的人

translation.en: See, people are more helpful if you're not an asshole.
translation.zh: 如果你不是个混蛋 人们会更乐于帮你

translation.en: Yeah, all right.
translation.zh: 是啊 好吧

translation.en: I have a call in at Utica.
translation.zh: 我在尤蒂卡接了个电话

translation.en: -Utica? -Her brother.
translation.zh: -尤蒂卡？ -她弟

translation.en: Petty crimes mostly, worse up through the years.
translation.zh: 他大多数都是轻罪 近几年情况更糟

translation.en: He was transporting duffels and got caught.
translation.zh: 他在运送行李箱时被抓住了

translation.en: Five years incarcerated at Utica.
translation.zh: 在尤蒂卡被监禁五年

translation.en: Same place Paul McKinney did time.
translation.zh: 保罗·麦金尼也在那里坐牢

translation.en: That's too much of a coincidence.
translation.zh: 这也太巧合了

translation.en: Her brother incarcerated in the same place as…
translation.zh: 她弟弟被关押在同一个地方…

translation.en: What do they call him? Oh, the Mud Victim.
translation.zh: -他们叫他什么？ -噢 泥泞受害者

translation.en: -Ah. See, that's poetry, Yale. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 耶鲁 你看 这就是诗情画意

translation.en: Motherfucker.
translation.zh: 混蛋

translation.en: This will do.
translation.zh: 这就够了

translation.en: We won't get far with her if she feels threatened.
translation.zh: 要是她感受到威胁 我们就会跟丢她

translation.en: -Oh, hi. -Hey. How you doin'?
translation.zh: -噢 嗨 -嘿 你好吗？

translation.en: Here you go, ma'am.
translation.zh: 给你 女士

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Let's get going. Thanks, Rose.
translation.zh: 我们走吧 谢谢 罗斯

translation.en: You okay, Sally? Fine.
translation.zh: -你还好吗 萨莉？ -我没事

translation.en: [sighs] You sold your trailer?
translation.zh: 你卖了你的拖车？

translation.en: I'm gonna stay in the area, Sal. Dolly's passin' by, too.
translation.zh: 我会留在这里 萨尔 多莉也会经过这里 我只是让你知道 如果你需要些什么

translation.en: Just so you know in case you need anythin'.
translation.zh: 多莉也会经过这里 我只是让你知道 如果你需要些什么

translation.en: Where?
translation.zh: 哪里？

translation.en: He's out already?
translation.zh: 他已经出狱了？

translation.en: What? I'll call you back.
translation.zh: -什么？ -我再打给你

translation.en: Fuck.
translation.zh: 妈的

translation.en: Yeah, besides processing.
translation.zh: 是的 除了处理中的

translation.en: Then check bank accounts, insurance, I don't know.
translation.zh: 那就查银行账户 保险 我也不知道

translation.en: No, I'm not yelling at you, David, I just--
translation.zh: 不 我不是冲你发火 大卫 我只是…

translation.en: All right, just get back to me, all right? Keep a record.
translation.zh: 好的 给我回电话 好吗？ 给我搜查结果

translation.en: Guy gave her cash for the trailer. Doesn't know shit about her.
translation.zh: 那人付现金买了她的拖车 但对她一无所知

translation.en: He got out of the sick ward a week ago. Taking a beating.
translation.zh: 他被人打了 一周前才从病房出来

translation.en: [sighs] Fuck. Fucking prisons.
translation.zh: 妈的 该死的监狱

translation.en: We lock 'em up, and we're just creating a breeding ground.
translation.zh: 我们把他们关起来 只是在创造一个犯罪滋生地

translation.en: It's a long straight ball to center field!
translation.zh: 这是一个直达中场的长传球

translation.en: Home run!
translation.zh: 本垒打

translation.en: Oh, come here.
translation.zh: 噢 过来

translation.en: Hey. What'd they do to you?
translation.zh: 嘿 他们对你做了什么？

translation.en: Hey. Can't you smile anymore?
translation.zh: 嘿 你就不能再笑笑吗？

translation.en: Oh. Oh, wow. She is-- she is really young.
translation.zh: 噢 哇 她… 她真的好小

translation.en: [Sally] When do we go meet 'em?
translation.zh: 什么时候去见他们？

translation.en: Well, they told me bring her out to the airfield about eleven o'clock.
translation.zh: 他们告诉我 十一点左右带她去机场

translation.en: Here, here. Why don't you have a seat right there?
translation.zh: 这里 你坐这里吧？

translation.en: [Dennis] Remember that?
translation.zh: 你还记得吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry I can't get you anything.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我没什么可以招待你的

translation.en: You know, nobody's been here for the past couple of years
translation.zh: 自爸爸死后 过去几年

translation.en: since… since our dad died.
translation.zh: 没人来过这里

translation.en: That's fine.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: That. Don't you touch that.
translation.zh: 那个 别碰那个

translation.en: -Get your paws off my trophy. -[laughing]
translation.zh: 别碰我的奖杯

translation.en: You know, I was-- I was--
translation.zh: 知道吗 我曾…

translation.en: I was happy when you got away.
translation.zh: 你离开时我曾经很高兴

translation.en: -I was. -I know.
translation.zh: -真的 -我知道

translation.en: I didn't have to-- I didn't have to think about…
translation.zh: 我就不必每天晚上

translation.en: listening to something happen to you every night.
translation.zh: 都担心又听到你出事的消息

translation.en: It's not as bad as I thought.
translation.zh: 这没我想像的那么糟

translation.en: I mean, the mess is as bad as I thought it'd be, but…
translation.zh: 我是说 这里和我想像的差不多 但是…

translation.en: It doesn't scare me anymore.
translation.zh: 它不再让我害怕了

translation.en: Well, that's good to hear.
translation.zh: 嗯 很高兴听你这么说

translation.en: Should we, uh… should we get going?
translation.zh: 我们该走了吗？

translation.en: Sure. Where?
translation.zh: 当然 去哪里？

translation.en: You're right about me, you know.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？ 你对我的看法没错

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I know nothing about this.
translation.zh: 我对此一无所知

translation.en: Grew up with a silver spoon.
translation.zh: 含着银汤匙长大

translation.en: Completely disconnected.
translation.zh: 完全和家人断开联系

translation.en: And the strongest memory I have of my mom was her picture hanging above my crib. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我对妈妈最深刻的记忆 就是她的照片挂在我的婴儿床上

translation.en: And I joined the bureau so I could mean something to someone.
translation.zh: 我加入了局里 希望能够对某些人有某种意义

translation.en: Can't say that's working out.
translation.zh: 我不能说这个选择奏效了

translation.en: Why'd you join?
translation.zh: 你为什么会加入？

translation.en: Doesn't matter why I joined.
translation.zh: 我为什么加入并不重要

translation.en: Only matters what I do with it.
translation.zh: 重要的是我能通过它做什么

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 你说

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Yeah, okay. Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的 好的 好

translation.en: Hospital has Sally on file. Over 30 years ago.
translation.zh: 医院有萨莉的档案 30多年前的

translation.en: Numerous ER visits, various, um… accidents.
translation.zh: 无数次看急诊 各种各样的意外

translation.en: She was brought in by her brother. There's a home address.
translation.zh: 她是被她弟弟送去的 有一个家庭住址

translation.en: Uh… I don't wanna give her back. I wanna buy her out.
translation.zh: 我不想把她送回去 我想赎她出来

translation.en: The girl? Leila, yeah.
translation.zh: -那个女孩？ -莱拉 是的

translation.en: Well, what are you gonna do with her?
translation.zh: 那么 你打算拿她怎么办？

translation.en: Where are you gonna get the money?
translation.zh: 你要从哪里弄来钱？

translation.en: I have some money. How much?
translation.zh: -我有一些钱 -多少钱？

translation.en: How'd you get it?
translation.zh: 你是怎么弄来的？

translation.en: Enough. I should have some left over, too.
translation.zh: 足够了 应该还会剩下一些

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -How did you get it?
translation.zh: -嗯 -你怎么得来的？

translation.en: How'd you get the money, Sal?
translation.zh: 萨尔 你怎么弄来的钱？

translation.en: Sold my trailer.
translation.zh: 我卖了拖车

translation.en: She needs us.
translation.zh: 她需要我们

translation.en: The way we needed each other.
translation.zh: 就像我们需要彼此那样

translation.en: You mean like a-- like a family or something?
translation.zh: 你是说像一个家庭什么的？

translation.en: Well… [chuckles] Well, that would take me just a little bit of time to get used to.
translation.zh: 好吧 我需要花点时间来适应一下

translation.en: You know?
translation.zh: 你能理解吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: We do this, you gotta let me take care of it, all right?
translation.zh: 要这么做 你就必须让我来处理 好吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna bring 'em the cash.
translation.zh: 我会把现金给他们

translation.en: Pay. Done.
translation.zh: 付款 搞定

translation.en: All right. Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧 好的

translation.en: Where's the bathroom?
translation.zh: 洗手间在哪里？

translation.en: We're-we're gonna take a little ride. Uh…
translation.zh: 我们要出去兜兜风 呃…

translation.en: No. No. Leila stays with me.
translation.zh: 不 不 莱拉要和我一起

translation.en: No, that's not how it works, sis. I gotta bring her.
translation.zh: 不 不是这样的 姐姐 我得带她去

translation.en: You-you could've taken her to the police for all they know.
translation.zh: 他们都知道 你本想把她带到警察那里去的

translation.en: All right. I'll go then.
translation.zh: 好吧 那我去

translation.en: No, Sal. Sal. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 不 萨尔

translation.en: If she's going, I'm going. Uh, Leila, let's go.
translation.zh: 她得去 那我也去 莱拉 我们走

translation.en: -Sal. -I still have to pee.
translation.zh: -萨尔 -我还是要尿尿

translation.en: It's-it's just right here.
translation.zh: 厕所就在这里

translation.en: -[sighs] Useless… -I'll turn the truck around.
translation.zh: -你… -我把卡车调头

translation.en: It's just a bad idea.
translation.zh: 这是个馊主意

translation.en: Get out of your pajamas. It's time to go.
translation.zh: 换下你的睡衣 该走了

translation.en: -[beeping] -[automated voice] Joining conference now.
translation.zh: 立即加入群聊

translation.en: Sally's here.
translation.zh: 萨莉来了

translation.en: Hi, Sally.
translation.zh: 嗨 萨莉

translation.en: [over radio] Dolly's here with us.
translation.zh: 多莉和我们一起

translation.en: That's right, Rose. Pattie's here, too.
translation.zh: 没错 罗斯 帕蒂也在这里

translation.en: She's slow as a little turtle, just like you, Sally.
translation.zh: 她跟小乌龟一样慢 萨莉 就像你

translation.en: Come on, baby doll, get with it.
translation.zh: 得了吧 小娃娃 跟上来

translation.en: -[Dolly] I'm just sayin'. -[Rose] Shut up, Dolly.
translation.zh: -我只是说说 -闭嘴 多莉

translation.en: Sally's got some serious business to take care of.
translation.zh: 萨莉有重要的事情要处理

translation.en: Where are you headed?
translation.zh: 你们要去哪里？

translation.en: Remember that old airport? Southeast?
translation.zh: 还记得那个旧机场吗？ 东南方？

translation.en: Hell yeah, I remember that place.
translation.zh: 当然 我记得那个地方

translation.en: Yeah, me too, I was gonna be a flight attendant before I broke my teeth.
translation.zh: 当然 我记得那个地方 是的 我也记得 在我摔坏牙齿前我本打算当空姐的

translation.en: Just wanna tell ya, it's good to know you ladies are out there.
translation.zh: 我只想告诉你们 很高兴知道你们这些女士都在

translation.en: We're always out here. [grunts]
translation.zh: 我们总是都在

translation.en: Come rain or come shine.
translation.zh: 风雨无阻

translation.en: Dennis? Leila?
translation.zh: 丹尼斯？ 莱拉？

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: You look fucked up.
translation.zh: 你看起来糟透了

translation.en: Huh? Oh, yeah?
translation.zh: 什么？ 噢 是吗？

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Freezing out there.
translation.zh: 噢 是的 外面很冷

translation.en: Well, Leila found something. I think you're gonna like it.
translation.zh: 莱拉发现了一个东西 我想你会喜欢的

translation.en: [grunts] Sal, what are you doin'?
translation.zh: 萨尔 你在干什么？

translation.en: What are you doin'?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？

translation.en: It's-it's-it's-it's the dress
translation.zh: 这裙子

translation.en: that dad bought you for your 13th birthday.
translation.zh: 是爸爸为你13岁生日买的礼物

translation.en: I thought you'd like it.
translation.zh: 我以为你会喜欢

translation.en: -I thought you'd like it, Sal. -Take it off. Take it off, Leila.
translation.zh: -我想你会喜欢 萨尔 -把它脱下来 脱下来 莱拉 萨尔 我以为你会觉得它很可爱

translation.en: [Dennis] Sal--I-I thought you'd think it was cute. I thought you'd like it. I--
translation.zh: 我以为你会喜欢 我…

translation.en: -I don't! -All right, all right,
translation.zh: -我不喜欢！ -好吧 好吧

translation.en: -I fucked up. I'm sorry! -Take it off!
translation.zh: -我搞砸了 抱歉 -脱下来

translation.en: [Finley] It's clear.
translation.zh: 这里安全

translation.en: Hair.
translation.zh: 是头发

translation.en: They were here.
translation.zh: 她们曾经在这里

translation.en: We missed 'em.
translation.zh: 我们错过了她们

translation.en: Shit, shit, shit, shit. Shit!
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: I'll go.
translation.zh: 我去

translation.en: Where's the girl?
translation.zh: 那女孩在哪里？

translation.en: I wanna buy her out.
translation.zh: 我想赎她出来

translation.en: That wasn't the deal.
translation.zh: 这和我们说好的交易不同

translation.en: I'll pay more than the going rate.
translation.zh: 我出比现价更多的钱

translation.en: Let me see her. No.
translation.zh: -让我看看她 -不

translation.en: -[Dennis] Come on. -[Sally] Dennis!
translation.zh: -来吧 -丹尼斯

translation.en: I have the cash.
translation.zh: 我有现金

translation.en: But I need to know we're cut clean.
translation.zh: 但我要确保我们彻底了断

translation.en: My brother, me, the girl.
translation.zh: 我弟弟、我还有那个女孩

translation.en: And we don't see you anymore.
translation.zh: 我们从此再也不见

translation.en: Sure. You bought it, you own it.
translation.zh: 当然 你买了就属于你了

translation.en: Really? You think I'm just gonna let you take the girl?
translation.zh: 你真的觉得我会让你带走那个女孩？

translation.en: How do I know you won't talk?
translation.zh: 我怎么知道你不会说出去？

translation.en: 'Cause I'm just as guilty as everybody else.
translation.zh: 因为我和你们所有人一样有罪

translation.en: That's it, just get the girl and let's get out of here!
translation.zh: 够了！ 带上那个女孩 我们离开这里

translation.en: Don't hurt my sister! I said, don't hurt my sister!
translation.zh: 别伤害我姐 我说了 别伤害我姐姐

translation.en: -[man] Back here! -[Dennis] Hey.
translation.zh: -回来 -嘿！

translation.en: Get the girl and let's go!
translation.zh: -抓住那女孩 我们走 -妈的！

translation.en: -Hey! -[grunts]
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: [man] Come here.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: -Hey! -Fuck!
translation.zh: -嘿 -妈的

translation.en: -[Sally grunting] -[Dennis] Hey! Easy.
translation.zh: 嘿 冷静

translation.en: -Den-- -Hey! Get off her!
translation.zh: -丹… -嘿 放开她

translation.en: -Get off her! Hey! -Fuck you!
translation.zh: -放开她 嘿 -去你妈的

translation.en: -Hey, go easy! -Get him!
translation.zh: -嘿 冷静 -救命！

translation.en: [woman gasps] Dennis, what?
translation.zh: 丹尼斯 你搞什么？

translation.en: I said-- I told him not to hurt my sister.
translation.zh: 我说过 我告诉过他别伤害我姐姐

translation.en: You said to make it look real!
translation.zh: 是你说的要做得像真的一样

translation.en: Not that real! I said don't hurt my sister!
translation.zh: 没那么真 我说过别伤害我姐姐

translation.en: [Dennis] Why couldn't you just get the fucking kid, Claire? Huh?
translation.zh: 为什么你就不能抓住 那该死的孩子 克莱尔？ 嗯？

translation.en: I told you exactly where she was!
translation.zh: 我告诉过你她在哪里

translation.en: -Now get in the van! -[Leila] Let go!
translation.zh: -马上上车 -放手

translation.en: -Dennis? -Let go of me!
translation.zh: -丹尼斯？ -放开我

translation.en: You-you weren't supposed to see this.
translation.zh: 你不该看到这一切的

translation.en: -No, Sal. Sal, listen, Sal-- -Let go of me!
translation.zh: -不 萨尔 听着 萨尔… -放开我！

translation.en: -Dennis-- -Let go of me!
translation.zh: -丹尼斯… -放开我

translation.en: Stop it! Sal, you weren't supposed to see this.
translation.zh: 住手 萨尔 你不应该看到这个

translation.en: Sal. Sal, no! Let her go!
translation.zh: 萨尔 萨尔 不要 放开她

translation.en: Let her go! Let her go.
translation.zh: 放开她 放开她

translation.en: I was just gonna do it for a bit till we got on our feet.
translation.zh: 我只是想在我们站稳脚跟前做一点

translation.en: Sal, you were not supposed to see this.
translation.zh: 萨尔 你不应该看到这一切

translation.en: Get in the fucking van, Claire!
translation.zh: 克莱尔 他妈的快上车！

translation.en: Sal…
translation.zh: 萨尔…

translation.en: Please…
translation.zh: 求你…

translation.en: Claire, get in the van.
translation.zh: 克莱尔 上车

translation.en: -Please. -Let me get rid of her, okay?
translation.zh: -求你了 -让我把她弄走 好吗？

translation.en: Just let me get rid of her, and-and we get back to us, Sal, I promise.
translation.zh: 我把她弄走 我们就回到从前那样 萨尔 我保证

translation.en: You'll see, it's gonna be fine.
translation.zh: 你会看到 一切都会好起来的

translation.en: No, Sally!
translation.zh: 不 萨莉！

translation.en: Sal, it's gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 萨尔 没事的

translation.en: Sally! Please!
translation.zh: 萨莉 拜托你！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Dennis, stop! Stop! Don't!
translation.zh: 丹尼斯 停下 住手 不要！

translation.en: Leila!
translation.zh: 莱拉！

translation.en: [Sally] Leila!
translation.zh: 莱拉！

translation.en: Leila. Leila.
translation.zh: 莱拉 莱拉

translation.en: Sally?
translation.zh: 萨莉？

translation.en: [Dennis] Come on, Sal!
translation.zh: 萨尔 来吧

translation.en: Come on, Sal!
translation.zh: 萨尔 来吧

translation.en: Fly away with me.
translation.zh: 和我远走高飞

translation.en: Come fly away with me.
translation.zh: 跟我远走高飞

translation.en: We'll go to Mars…
translation.zh: 我们要去火星…

translation.en: Saturn, and we'll go to Jupiter and China.
translation.zh: 土星 我们还要前往木星和中国

translation.en: Anywhere but here. We get the hell outta here.
translation.zh: 去这里以外的任何地方 我们离开这鬼地方

translation.en: We're just a couple of kids.
translation.zh: 我们只是两个孩子

translation.en: -[grunts] -Kids… Sal?
translation.zh: 孩子 萨尔？

translation.en: No, Dennis.
translation.zh: 不 丹尼斯

translation.en: They are kids.
translation.zh: 她们才是孩子

translation.en: Not us.
translation.zh: 不是我们

translation.en: How much you sell 'em for?
translation.zh: 你把她们卖多少钱？

translation.en: -No. -How much a job?
translation.zh: -不 -干这挣多少钱？

translation.en: -No. -How many times a day?
translation.zh: -不 -一天挣多少钱？

translation.en: [groans] No, you-you got it all wrong. Sal, I do it for you. I do it for you!
translation.zh: 不 你完全搞错了 萨尔 我是为你做的 是为你做的

translation.en: -No! -I-- Everything I do…
translation.zh: -不！ -我做的一切…

translation.en: I want you to tell me…
translation.zh: 我要你告诉我…

translation.en: what-what that girl does for you that I don't do.
translation.zh: 那个女孩为你做过什么我没做的事？

translation.en: What do you owe her?
translation.zh: 你欠她什么？

translation.en: [Leila] She doesn't owe me anything.
translation.zh: 她什么都不欠我

translation.en: [Dennis] Sal…
translation.zh: 萨尔…

translation.en: Hey, Sal.
translation.zh: 嘿 萨尔

translation.en: Let's get you in the car. Watch your head, all right?
translation.zh: 我们带你上车 小心头 好吗？

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Worried about him?
translation.zh: 你担心他吗？

translation.en: Never gonna stop.
translation.zh: 永远都会

translation.en: Well, if we can get him to help us…
translation.zh: 如果能让他帮我们…

translation.en: maybe we can catch the big guy.
translation.zh: 也许我们能抓住大鱼

translation.en: Promise you'll take care of those kids.
translation.zh: 答应我照顾好那些孩子

translation.en: Oh, don't worry. I'll see to them.
translation.zh: 别担心 我会照顾好她们

translation.en: That's what gets me up in the morning.
translation.zh: 这就是我每天起床的动力

translation.en: Well, you… probably better get going.
translation.zh: 嗯 你… 也最好赶快离开

translation.en: Local police are on their way.
translation.zh: 当地警察正在赶来

translation.en: We have your statement, so…
translation.zh: 我们收到了你的口供 所以…

translation.en: Have a nice ride.
translation.zh: 祝你旅途愉快

translation.en: You know, we're gonna get in trouble for this.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？ 我们会因此陷入麻烦

translation.en: I'm gonna get in trouble for this. You didn't know shit about it.
translation.zh: 我会因此陷入麻烦 你什么都不知道

translation.en: It's not your fault if I went rogue.
translation.zh: 就算我叛变了 也不是你的错

translation.en: You're still an asshole.
translation.zh: 你还是个混蛋

translation.en: To you.
translation.zh: 这句话还给你

translation.en: Seatbelt?
translation.zh: 安全带？

translation.en: ♪ I will drive past your house ♪
translation.zh: （每个人口贩卖的幸存者 都有自己的故事）

translation.en: ♪ And if the lights are all down ♪
translation.zh: （谨以本片献给她们 以及那些帮助她们的勇敢的人）
